import { Button, Navbar } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useState } from "react"; function Menu() { const [selectedTag, setSelectedTag] = useState("All"); // Sample menu items for each tag const menuItems = [ { id: 1, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "All" ,image:"https://food.fnr.sndimg.com/content/dam/images/food/fullset/2019/7/11/0/FNK_the-best-pancakes_H_s4x3.jpg.rend.hgtvcom.616.462.suffix/1562853903667.jpeg"}, { id: 2, name: "Item 2", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "All" ,image:""}, { id: 3, name: "Item 3", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Breakfast",image:"" }, { id: 4, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Breakfast" ,image:""}, { id: 5, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Lunch" ,image:""}, { id: 6, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Lunch" ,image:""}, { id: 7, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Shake" ,image:""}, { id: 8, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Shake" ,image:""}, { id: 9, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Dinner" ,image:""}, { id: 10, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Dinner" ,image:""}, ]; // Filter menu items based on the selected tag const filteredMenuItems = selectedTag === "All" ? menuItems : menuItems.filter((item) => item.tag === selectedTag); return ( <>

{item.name}

} {/* Add horizontal line after every odd index */}
))}
); } export default Menu;
